<inner> add(cpm, id)

Add a component to the view. Components that are not added explicitly are still going to be added by the alicate, and their model will be constructed from the view model if one is provided.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
cpm Component Component to be added to this container
id String Id of the component to be added
